ModMetaData.name: LMC015.激光栅栏
ModMetaData.author: Rikiki
ModMetaData.description: 汉化：jxb12306 Author jxb12306 FROM 3DM Localization Group 合集链接：http://bbs.3dmgame.com/thread-5842015-1-1.html This mod adds the MiningCo. laser fence.\nSee the forum thread for content/changelog and related mods. https://ludeon.com/forums/index.php?topic=14711.msg153939#msg153942\n\n这个MOD添加了采矿集团科技系列中的激光栅栏\n\n汉化：jxb12306
